# MountPoint

| Characteristic | Value    |
| -------------- | -------- |
| Type           | `object` |

## Properties

### `path` **<span style="color:orange;">(required)</span>**

The path to mount the file system.

| Characteristic | Value    |
| -------------- | -------- |
| Type           | `string` |

### `options` (optional)

The mount options.

| Characteristic | Value        |
| -------------- | ------------ |
| Type           | `string`     |
| Default        | `"defaults"` |
